mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS ROWNUM, A.*, CASE WHEN A.POINT_CODE = 'POINT_J' THEN '회원가입' WHEN A.POINT_CODE = 'POINT_C' THEN '충전' WHEN A.POINT_CODE = 'POINT_B' THEN '게시판' WHEN A.POINT_CODE = 'POINT_P' THEN '결제' WHEN A.POINT_CODE = 'POINT_E' THEN '이벤트' WHEN A.POINT_CODE = 'POINT_R' THEN '결제취소' ELSE '기타' END AS POINT_CODE_NAME, CASE WHEN A.POINT_COST >= 0 THEN '적립' ELSE '사용' END AS POINT_SECTION FROM ( SELECT P.*, M.MEM_POINT FROM TBL_POINT AS P JOIN TBL_MEMBER AS M ON P.POINT_USER_ID = M.MEM_ID WHERE M.MEM_ID = #{mem_id} ORDER BY POINT_USE_DATE ASC ) AS A, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) AS R ORDER BY POINT_USE_DATE DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE rent001.TBL_MEMBER SET MEM_POINT = mem_point + #{mem_point}, MEM_UDATE = now() WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
